author: Staff Reporter
text:
RELIGION

Covai Kamatchipuram Adheenam: Ulaga Samadhana Peruvizha, 7 p.m.

Subramanya Swamy Temple: Thai poosam pujas, Marudhamalai, 9 a.m.

Arulmigu Bala Dhandayudhapani Swamy Temple: Thaipoosam pujas,Sukrawarpet, 7.30 a.m.

Arulmigu Rathina Vinayagar Temple: Sankatahara Chathurthi pujas, RS Puram, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Sri Thyaga Brahma Gananjali: Music Festival, Sri Venugopalaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Coimbatore Municipal Corporation High School and Higher Secondary Schools old students association: prize distribution to students and felicitation to school principals, R.S. Puram Corporation Girls Higher Secondary School, 4 p.m.

Karunya University: Conference on Canadian studies, Elohim Auditorium, 10 a.m.

Sri Kalaivani College of Education: Citizenship Training Camp, 8:30 a.m.

Karunya University: Workshop on Laboratory Quality Control, 10 a.m.

Dr. G.R. Damodaran College of Science: Blood donation camp, RD hall, 10 a.m.

Maharaja Arts and Science College: Awareness programme on financial planning, 10 a.m.

Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan: Talk on ‘Kongu Nattu Perungadai’, R.S.Puram, 6 p.m.

Pioneer College of Arts and Science: Inauguration of Internal Quality Assurance Cell, 10 a.m.

GRG School of Management Studies: Talk on ‘Freedom, Choice and Responsibility,’ 2 p.m.

PPG Institute of Technology: Workshop for diploma students on ‘Hands on Training on PLC,’ 9:30 a.m.

Native Angels Network & Native Lead Foundation: Launch of Native start-up circle, PSG College of Technology, 11 a.m.

UDHAGAMANDALAM

Tata Institute of Fundamental Research: Talk on Cosmic Rays, Anna stadium, 2 p.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Entrepreneurship awareness camp, Providence College for Women, Coonoor, 9:30 a.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore
